bug.author: yangninghua
bug.description: clion+mlpack `` /home/spple/clion-2018.2.5/bin/cmake/linux/bin/cmake -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Debug -G "CodeBlocks - Unix Makefiles" /home/spple/code/mlpack-mlpack-3.0.4 -- cotire 1.7.10 loaded. -- Armadillo libraries: /usr/lib/libarmadillo.so -- Boost version: 1.58.0 -- Found the following Boost libraries: -- program_options -- unit_test_framework -- serialization CMake Warning at CMakeLists.txt:425 (message): txt2man not found; man pages will not be generated. -- Found Python: /usr/bin/python -- Could NOT find Doxygen (missing: DOXYGEN_EXECUTABLE) -- Configuring done -- Generating done -- Build files have been written to: /home/spple/code/mlpack-mlpack-3.0.4/cmake-build-debug Problems were encountered while collecting compiler information: cc1plus: fatal error: /home/spple/code/mlpack-mlpack-3.0.4/cmake-build-debug/src/mlpack/cotire/mlpack_CXX_prefix.hxx: No such file or directory cc1plus: fatal error: /home/spple/code/mlpack-mlpack-3.0.4/cmake-build-debug/src/mlpack/tests/cotire/mlpack_test_CXX_prefix.hxx: No such file or directory [Finished] ``

comments.comment: At a first glance this looks really similar to: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/mlpack/mlpack/issues/1530>#1530</denchmark-link> , which was fixed in <denchmark-link:https://github.com/mlpack/mlpack/pull/1537>#1537</denchmark-link> . Do you mind to rerun the build against the master branch?
您还，我想问一下，您解决了那个关于Graph Cut RANSAC
